verses.verse: Then <S%G2532><s%> came <S%G4863>together<s%> <S%G4314>unto<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G5330>Pharisees,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5100>certain<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1122>scribes,<s%> which <S%G2064>came<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G2414>Jerusalem.<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> when they <S%G1492>saw<s%> <S%G5100>some<s%> of <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3101>disciples<s%> <S%G2068>eat<s%> <S%G740>bread<s%> with <S%G2839>defiled,<s%> that is to <S%G5123>say,<s%> with <S%G449>unwashen,<s%> <S%G5495>hands,<s%> they found <S%G3201>fault.<s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G5330>Pharisees,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2453>Jews,<s%> <S%G3362>except<s%> they <S%G3538>wash<s%> their <S%G5495>hands<s%> <S%G4435>oft,<s%> <S%G2068>eat<s%> <S%G3756>not,<s%> <S%G2902>holding<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3862>tradition<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4245>elders.<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> when they come <S%G575>from<s%> the <S%G58>market,<s%> <S%G3362>except<s%> they <S%G907>wash,<s%> they <S%G2068>eat<s%> <S%G3756>not.<s%> <S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G4183>many<s%> other <S%G243>things<s%> there <S%G2076>be,<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> they have <S%G3880>received<s%> to <S%G2902>hold,<s%> as the <S%G909>washing<s%> of <S%G4221>cups,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3582>pots,<s%> <S%G2532><s%> brazen <S%G5473>vessels,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> of <S%G2825>tables.<s%>

Then <S%G1899><s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G5330>Pharisees<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1122>scribes<s%> <S%G1905>asked<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G1302>Why<s%> <S%G4043>walk<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G4675>thy<s%> <S%G3101>disciples<s%> <S%G2596>according<s%> to <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3862>tradition<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4245>elders,<s%> <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G2068>eat<s%> <S%G740>bread<s%> with <S%G449>unwashen<s%> <S%G5495>hands?<s%>

<S%G1161><s%> <S%G3588>He<s%> <S%G611>answered<s%> and <S%G2036>said<s%> unto <S%G846>them,<s%> Well <S%G2573><s%> hath <S%G2268>Isaiah<s%> <S%G4395>prophesied<s%> <S%G4012>of<s%> <S%G5216>you<s%> <S%G5273>hypocrites,<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> it is <S%G1125>written,<s%> <S%G3778>This<s%> <S%G2992>people<s%> <S%G5091>honoreth<s%> <S%G3165>me<s%> with their <S%G5491>lips,<s%> <S%G1161>but<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G2588>heart<s%> is far <S%G568><s%> <S%G4206><s%> from <S%G575><s%> me. <S%G1700><s%>
Howbeit <S%G1161><s%> in <S%G3155>vain<s%> do they <S%G4576>worship<s%> <S%G3165>me,<s%> <S%G1321>teaching<s%> for <S%G1319>doctrines<s%> the <S%G1778>commandments<s%> of men. <S%G444><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> laying <S%G863>aside<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1785>commandment<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> ye <S%G2902>hold<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3862>tradition<s%> of <S%G444>men,<s%> as the <S%G909>washing<s%> of <S%G3582>pots<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> cups: <S%G4221><s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G243>other<s%> <S%G5108>such<s%> like <S%G3946>things<s%> ye do. <S%G4160><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> he <S%G3004>said<s%> unto <S%G846>them,<s%> Full <S%G2573>well<s%> ye <S%G114>reject<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1785>commandment<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> ye may <S%G5083>keep<s%> your <S%G5216>own<s%> tradition. <S%G3862><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> <S%G3475>Moses<s%> <S%G2036>said,<s%> <S%G5091>Honor<s%> <S%G4675>thy<s%> <S%G3962>father<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4675>thy<s%> <S%G3384>mother;<s%> and, whoso <S%G2551>curseth<s%> <S%G3962>father<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G3384>mother,<s%> let him <S%G5053>die<s%> the death: <S%G2288><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> <S%G5210>ye<s%> <S%G3004>say,<s%> <S%G1437>If<s%> a <S%G444>man<s%> shall <S%G2036>say<s%> to his <S%G3962>father<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G3384>mother,<s%> It is <S%G2878>Corban,<s%> that is to <S%G3603>say,<s%> a <S%G1435>gift,<s%> by whatsoever <S%G3739><s%> <S%G1437><s%> thou mightest be <S%G5623>profited<s%> <S%G1537>by<s%> <S%G1700>me;<s%> he shall be free.

And <S%G2532><s%> ye <S%G863>suffer<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> no <S%G3765>more<s%> to <S%G4160>do<s%> <S%G3762>aught<s%> for <S%G848>his<s%> <S%G3962>father<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G848>his<s%> mother; <S%G3384><s%>

Making the word of God of none effect <S%G208><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3056><s%> <S%G2316><s%> through <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G3862>tradition,<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> ye have delivered: <S%G3860><s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G5108>such<s%> like <S%G3946>things<s%> <S%G4160>do<s%> ye.

And <S%G2532><s%> when he had <S%G4341>called<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3793>people<s%> unto him, he <S%G3004>said<s%> unto <S%G846>them,<s%> Hearken <S%G191><s%> unto <S%G3450>me<s%> every <S%G3956>one<s%> of you, <S%G2532>and<s%> understand: <S%G4920><s%>

There <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G3762>nothing<s%> from <S%G1855>without<s%> a <S%G444>man,<s%> <S%G3739>that<s%> <S%G1531>entering<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G1410>can<s%> <S%G2840>defile<s%> him: <S%G846><s%> <S%G235>but<s%> the things which <S%G1607>come<s%> out <S%G575>of<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G1565>those<s%> <S%G2076>are<s%> they that <S%G2840>defile<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> man. <S%G444><s%>
If any <S%G1536>man<s%> <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G3775>ears<s%> to <S%G191>hear,<s%> let him hear. <S%G191><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3753>when<s%> he was <S%G1525>entered<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G3624>house<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3793>people,<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3101>disciples<s%> <S%G1905>asked<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G4012>concerning<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3850>parable.<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> he <S%G3004>saith<s%> unto <S%G846>them,<s%> Are <S%G2075><s%> <S%G5210>ye<s%> <S%G3779>so<s%> without <S%G801>understanding<s%> <S%G2532>also?<s%> Do ye <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G3539>perceive,<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> whatsoever <S%G3956>thing<s%> from <S%G1855>without<s%> <S%G1531>entereth<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G444>man,<s%> it cannot <S%G1410><s%> <S%G3756><s%> defile <S%G2840><s%> him; <S%G846><s%>

Because <S%G3754><s%> it <S%G1531>entereth<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G2588>heart,<s%> <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2836>belly,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> goeth <S%G1607>out<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G856>draught,<s%> <S%G2511>purging<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> meats? <S%G1033><s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> he <S%G3004>said,<s%> <S%G3754><s%> That which <S%G1607>cometh<s%> out <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G444>man,<s%> <S%G1565>that<s%> <S%G2840>defileth<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> man. <S%G444><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> from <S%G2081>within,<s%> out <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2588>heart<s%> of <S%G444>men,<s%> <S%G1607>proceed<s%> <S%G2556>evil<s%> <S%G1261>thoughts,<s%> <S%G3430>adulteries,<s%> <S%G4202>fornications,<s%> murders, <S%G5408><s%>

Thefts, <S%G2829><s%> <S%G4124>covetousness,<s%> <S%G4189>wickedness,<s%> <S%G1388>deceit,<s%> <S%G766>lasciviousness,<s%> an <S%G4190>evil<s%> <S%G3788>eye,<s%> <S%G988>blasphemy,<s%> <S%G5243>pride,<s%> foolishness: <S%G877><s%>
All <S%G3956><s%> <S%G5023>these<s%> evil <S%G4190>things<s%> <S%G1607>come<s%> from <S%G2081>within,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2840>defile<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> man. <S%G444><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> from <S%G1564>thence<s%> he <S%G450>arose,<s%> and <S%G565>went<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3181>borders<s%> of <S%G5184>Tyre<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4605>Sidon,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1525>entered<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> a <S%G3614>house,<s%> and <S%G2309>would<s%> have no <S%G3762>man<s%> <S%G1097>know<s%> it, <S%G2532>but<s%> he <S%G1410>could<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> be <S%G2990>hid.<s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> a certain <S%G1135>woman,<s%> <S%G3739>whose<s%> young <S%G2365>daughter<s%> <S%G2192>had<s%> an <S%G169>unclean<s%> <S%G4151>spirit,<s%> <S%G191>heard<s%> <S%G4012>of<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> and <S%G2064>came<s%> and <S%G4363>fell<s%> <S%G4314>at<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> feet: <S%G4228><s%>

<S%G1161><s%> <S%G3588>The<s%> <S%G1135>woman<s%> <S%G2258>was<s%> a <S%G1674>Greek,<s%> a <S%G4949>Syrophenician<s%> by <S%G1085>nation;<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> she <S%G2065>besought<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> he would cast <S%G1544>forth<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1140>devil<s%> out <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G848>her<s%> <S%G2364>daughter.<s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> unto <S%G846>her,<s%> Let <S%G863><s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G5043>children<s%> <S%G4412>first<s%> be filled: <S%G5526><s%> <S%G1063>for<s%> it <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G2570>meet<s%> to <S%G2983>take<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G5043>children's<s%> <S%G740>bread,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> to <S%G906>cast<s%> it unto <S%G3588>the<s%> dogs. <S%G2952><s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3588>she<s%> <S%G611>answered<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> unto <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G3483>Yes,<s%> <S%G2962>Lord:<s%> <S%G1063>yet<s%> <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2952>dogs<s%> <S%G5270>under<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G5132>table<s%> <S%G2068>eat<s%> <S%G575>of<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3813>children's<s%> <S%G5589>crumbs.<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> he <S%G2036>said<s%> unto <S%G846>her,<s%> For <S%G1223><s%> <S%G5126>this<s%> <S%G3056>saying<s%> go thy <S%G5217>way;<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1140>devil<s%> is <S%G1831>gone<s%> out <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G4675>thy<s%> daughter. <S%G2364><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> when she was <S%G565>come<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G848>her<s%> <S%G3624>house,<s%> she <S%G2147>found<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1140>devil<s%> gone <S%G1831>out,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> her <S%G2364>daughter<s%> <S%G906>laid<s%> <S%G1909>upon<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2825>bed.<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3825>again,<s%> <S%G1831>departing<s%> <S%G1537>from<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3725>coasts<s%> of <S%G5184>Tyre<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4605>Sidon,<s%> he <S%G2064>came<s%> <S%G4314>unto<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2281>sea<s%> of <S%G1056>Galilee,<s%> <S%G303>through<s%> the <S%G3319>midst<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3725>coasts<s%> of <S%G1179>Decapolis.<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> they <S%G5342>bring<s%> unto <S%G846>him<s%> one that was <S%G2974>deaf,<s%> and had an impediment in his <S%G3424>speech;<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> they <S%G3870>beseech<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G2443>to<s%> put his hand <S%G2007>upon<s%> <S%G5495><s%> <S%G846>him.<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> he <S%G618>took<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G2596>aside<s%> <S%G2398><s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3793>multitude,<s%> and <S%G906>put<s%> <S%G848>his<s%> <S%G1147>fingers<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3775>ears,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> he <S%G4429>spit,<s%> and <S%G680>touched<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G1100>tongue;<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> looking <S%G308>up<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G3772>heaven,<s%> he <S%G4727>sighed,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3004>saith<s%> unto <S%G846>him,<s%> Ephphatha, <S%G2188><s%> that <S%G3603>is,<s%> Be <S%G1272>opened.<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G2112>straightway<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G189>ears<s%> were <S%G1272>opened,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1199>string<s%> of <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G1100>tongue<s%> was <S%G3089>loosed,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> he <S%G2980>spake<s%> <S%G3723>plain.<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> he <S%G1291>charged<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> they should <S%G2036>tell<s%> no <S%G3367>man:<s%> <S%G1161>but<s%> the <S%G3745>more<s%> <S%G846>he<s%> <S%G1291>charged<s%> <S%G846>them,<s%> so much the <S%G3123>more<s%> a great <S%G4054>deal<s%> they <S%G2784>published<s%> it;

And <S%G2532><s%> were beyond <S%G5249>measure<s%> <S%G1605>astonished,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> He hath <S%G4160>done<s%> all <S%G3956>things<s%> <S%G2573>well:<s%> he <S%G4160>maketh<s%> <S%G2532>both<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2974>deaf<s%> to <S%G191>hear,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G216>dumb<s%> to <S%G2980>speak.<s%>
